meanings.definition: Discourage or prevent (someone) from doing something
meanings.sent1: The loud alarm deters thieves from breaking into the house.
meanings.sent2: Bright street lights deters criminals from lurking in the shadows.
meanings.sent3: The barking dog deters the mailman from delivering mail.
meanings.sent4: The strong smell of garlic deters vampires from entering the house.
meanings.sent5: The scary scarecrow deters birds from eating the crops.

meanings.definition: Act as a deterrent to prevent something happening
meanings.sent1: Wearing a helmet deters head injuries during bike accidents.
meanings.sent2: The warning signs deters accidents on the dangerous curve.
meanings.sent3: The bright smile deters sadness from taking over.
meanings.sent4: The umbrella deters getting wet in the rain.
meanings.sent5: The fence deters the dog from running into the street.
